00020 class Room * Door::OtherSideFrom(class Room *room) {
00021         if(room == this->_room1) {
00022                 return this->_room2;
00023         } else if(room == this->_room2) {
00024                 return this->_room1;
00025         } else {
00026                 return 0;
00027         }
00028 }

00030 void Door::Print(int indent) {
00031         PrintIndent(indent);
00032         printf("Door:\n");
00033         
00034         PrintIndent(indent+2);
00035         if(this->_room1) printf("_room1 = %d\n", this->_room1->GetRoomNo());
00036         else printf("_room1 = NULL\n");
00037         
00038         PrintIndent(indent+2);

00040         else printf("_room2 = NULL\n");
00041         
00042         PrintIndent(indent+2);
00043         if(this->_isOpen) printf("_isOpen = true\n");
00044         else printf("_isOpen = false\n");
00045
